list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: you will regret it when you are older
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bạn sẽ hối tiếc khi bạn già hơn
bạn sẽ dừng lại ở đây chứ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: expressing facts about ability or capacity.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a rock so light that it will float on water
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một tảng đá để ánh sáng mà nó sẽ nổi trên mặt nước
Cô ấy sẽ nhảy hàng giờ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: expressing probability or expectation about something in the present.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they will be miles away by now
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bây giờ họ sẽ đi xa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make or try to make (someone) do something or (something) happen by the exercise of mental powers.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: reluctantly he willed himself to turn and go back
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: miễn cưỡng anh ta sẽ tự mình quay lại và quay trở lại

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: intend, desire, or wish (something) to happen.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: their friendship flourished particularly because Adams willed it
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tình bạn của họ phát triển đặc biệt bởi vì Adams sẽ sẵn sàng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: bequeath something to (someone) by the terms of one's will.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his father willed the farm to Mr. Timms
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cha ông sẽ chúc trang trại với ông Timms

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the faculty by which a person decides on and initiates action.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cô ấy có một sắt sẽ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a legal document containing instructions as to what should be done with one's money and property after one's death.
